name: Mimikyu
description: Its actual appearance is unknown. A scholar who saw what was under its rag was overwhelmed by terror and died from the shock.

abilities.name: Disguise
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is in its Disguised Form and takes damage from a move, it switches to its Busted Form and the damage is prevented.  Other effects are not prevented.  This ability cannot be copied or replaced.  This ability only takes effect for Mimikyu.
abilities.description: Once per battle, the shroud that covers the Pokémon can protect it from an attack.
